code: export var Colors={Black:{900:'#23242A',200:'#DDE2EB'},Gray:{600:'#757575',300:'#E0E0E0'},White:'#ffffff',Yellow:{500:'#F2C94C',200:'#fff9e6',100:'#FFF4D4'},Red:{400:'#F87171'}};export var Fonts={Helvetica:'"HelveticaNeue", sans-serif'};export var Shadows={main:'0px 4px 28px rgba(136, 169, 200, 0.15)',notification:'0px 4px 14px rgba(136, 169, 200, 0.3)'};export var Sizes={headerHeight:'64px'};export var Gradients={bodyBackground:"linear-gradient(180deg, ".concat(Colors.Yellow[100],", ").concat(Colors.White,")")};export var Transitions={duration:'0.25s',all:'all 0.25s ease'};export var BorderRad={s:'8px',m:'24px',round:'50%',full:'1000px'};
